title: Robotiq hand communication problem and erradic behavior

content.raw:
The latest drcsim-prerelease Robotiq hands doesn't seem to work properly.

1) it takes sending multiple messages to the hand for it to respond properly ( publish the correct topics multiple times)
2) the fingers seem to get stuck in weird positions, specially the distal link which gets stuck at the limit even after you send multiple messages to open the hand.
3) the hand interaction with other objects is not correct, causing weird spasms. Attached is a  video to support that.

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B5oT91EGbWysb21QYWxvUW56OVU/view
